bind.calculate: if(today() >= date(date(/data/case_dob) + 700), "", date(min(int(/data/next_visit_normal), int(/data/next_visit_birth_cert), int(/data/next_visit_feed), int(/data/next_visit_bednet), int(/data/next_visit_high_risk), int(/data/next_visit_vita), int(/data/next_visit_deworm))))

if((today() - date(/data/case_dob)) < 92, date(date(/data/case_dob) + 112 - 7), if((today() - date(/data/case_dob)) < 153, date(date(/data/case_dob) + 183 - 7), if((today() - date(/data/case_dob)) < 245, date(date(/data/case_dob) + 275 - 7), if((today() - date(/data/case_dob)) < 335, date(date(/data/case_dob) + 365 - 7), if((today() - date(/data/case_dob)) < 518, date(date(/data/case_dob) + 548 - 7), date(date(/data/case_dob) + 730 - 7))))))

if(today() >= date(date(/data/case_dob)+153) and today() <= date(date(/data/case_dob)+305) and (/data/case_birth_certificate != "yes" and /data/visit_questions/birth_certificate != "yes"), date(today() + 30), date(date(/data/case_dob)+731))

if(today() >= date(date(/data/case_dob)+153) and (/data/visit_questions/comp_breastfeeding = "no" or /data/visit_questions/eats_3_times_a_day = "no" or /data/visit_questions/iron_rich_foods = "no"), date(today() + 30), date(date(/data/case_dob)+731))
if((/data/case_vita_date = '' or today() > date(date(/data/case_vita_date) + 183)) and /data/visit_questions/vita != 'yes', date(today() + 30), date(date(/data/case_dob) + 731))
if((/data/case_deworm_date = '' or today() > date(date(/data/case_deworm_date) + 183)) and /data/visit_questions/deworm != 'yes', date(today() + 30), date(date(/data/case_dob) + 731))

if(/data/visit_questions/child_evaluation/fast_breathing = "yes" or /data/visit_questions/child_evaluation/blood_in_stool = "yes" or /data/visit_questions/child_evaluation/danger_signs_group/long_fever or /data/visit_questions/child_evaluation/danger_signs_group/vomit = "yes" or /data/visit_questions/child_evaluation/danger_signs_group/convulsions = "yes" or /data/visit_questions/child_evaluation/danger_signs_group/chest_indrawing = "yes" or /data/visit_questions/child_evaluation/danger_signs_group/not_feeding = "yes" or /data/visit_questions/child_evaluation/danger_signs_group/unconscious = "yes" or /data/visit_questions/child_evaluation/danger_signs_group/long_diarrhea = "yes" or /data/visit_questions/child_evaluation/danger_signs_group/long_cough = "yes" or /data/visit_questions/child_evaluation/danger_signs_group/other_danger_sign = "yes", "yes", "no")

concat(if(/data/visit_questions/child_evaluation/has_fever = "yes", "fever, ", ""), if(/data/visit_questions/child_evaluation/fast_breathing = "yes", "fast breathing, ", ""), if(/data/visit_questions/child_evaluation/danger_signs_group/vomit = "yes", "vomiting everything, ", ""), if(/data/visit_questions/child_evaluation/danger_signs_group/convulsions = "yes", "convulsions, ", ""), if(/data/visit_questions/child_evaluation/danger_signs_group/chest_indrawing = "yes", "chest indrawing, ", ""), if(/data/visit_questions/child_evaluation/danger_signs_group/not_feeding = "yes", "not able to breastfeed or drink, ", ""), if(/data/visit_questions/child_evaluation/danger_signs_group/unconscious = "yes", "sleepy or unconscious, ", ""), if(/data/visit_questions/child_evaluation/danger_signs_group/long_diarrhea = "yes", "diarrhea for 14 days or with bloody stool or dehydration, ", ""), if(/data/visit_questions/child_evaluation/danger_signs_group/long_cough = "yes", "cough for more than 21 days, ", ""), if(/data/visit_questions/child_evaluation/danger_signs_group/other_danger_sign= "yes", "other danger sign, ", ""))

text.value: Please fill out the de-registration form for the child.
Do you have a birth record?
Is the child high risk e.g Malnutrition, OVC, Disability?
Why is the child high risk?
Does the child breathe faster than normal?
Baby has problem with breastfeeding or drinking?
Fever for the last 7 days or more ?
Child has danger signs and should be referred to the clinic.
If diarrhea in past 2 weeks, was ORS provided?
Vitamin A Dose in last six months?
Deworming Dose in last six months?
Is the infant receiving only breastfeeding?
Does the infant receive food and water?
Child receiving complementary food and breastfeeding?
Child eats at least 3 times and 2 snacks a day?
Child feeds Iron rich foods? such as pumpkin, smash fish, milk
Was the father or chosen supporter present during this visit?
This child still needs a birth certificate.
Make sure that child receives appropriate feeding.
Make sure that child uses a bednet.
This child is high risk. Follow up often.
This child needs a Vitamin A dose every six months.
This child needs a deworming dose every six months.
Please do a visit for child immediately.
Please do a visit for child in days.
All visits complete. This child will be de-registered
Please refer this child to the Clinic!
How long since symptoms first noticed?
Sena muyanda kuchincha zyina lya mwana?
Sena mulijisi na bulembo bwaamba kuzyalwa?
Is the child high risk e.g Malnutrition, OVC, Disability?
Nkaambo nzi mwana nayeeyelwa kuba muntenda mpati?
Sena banyina balabelesya nzila yakutantaanya kuzyala?
5. Kujubwa mitangala ya kubusankwa naa kujaala luzyalilo
Sena mwana uliji penzi kunyonka naa Kunwa
Sena ula kola kwa mazuba makumi obile akamwi naa akwiindilizya?
Mwana uula zitondezyo ziyoosya alimwi uyelede kutumina kuchibadela
Sena chipepa cha chipimo chabana chilalembwa bwelede?
Sena mwatondezya mbobelede kubelsya meenda abuumi (ORS)?
Kuti kusoomona kwakaba kwansondo zyobile zyainda, sena wakapegwa maanzi a buumi (ORS)?
Sena wakapegwa musamu wa Vitamin A kumyeezi musanu aumwi yainda?
Sena wakapegwa musamu wa mayoka kumyeezi musanu aumwi yainda?
Sena mwana mutete ulalya akunywa meenda?
Sena mwana ulatambula chakulya akunyonka nkolo?
Sena banyina babelesya munyo ujisi iodini?
Sena mwana ulalya ziindi zotatwe akuyungizya kusaninwa ziindi zyobile abuzuba?
Sena mwana upegwa cisela cankomeki yacakulya?
Sena mwana ulalya zyakulya zijisi busani buyungizya bulowa? mbuli matanga, inswi, amukupa.
Sena bawisi nanka basalidwe kugwasilizya baliko mukuswaigwa oku?
Uyu mwana ulelede kuti akapegwe cipepa cazyalwa
Amubweze ntamu kutegwa uyo mwana kalisigwa bwelede
Amubweze ntamu kutegwa uyo mwana kabelesya kansabwa kamansenya
Uyu mwana ulanteenda mpati. Kamuswaya swaya.
Uyu mwana uyelede kupegwa musamu wa vitamin A kwainda myeezi ili musanu aomwe
Uyu mwana uyelede kupegwa musamu wamayoka kwainda myeezi ili musanu aomwe
Kuswaya koonse kwamana. Uyu mwana ulagwisigwa mu regista.
Nciindi cilamfu buti kuzwa banyina nibatalika kubona zitondezyo?
3. Kutasika amawoola makumi one amusanu aatatu
4. Kwiinda amawoola ali makumi one amusanu aatatu
Amulange kutumina mu mawoola ali makumi one
